ing.item: Dry pinto; Roman, or other red beans

directions.step:
From: Margaret Marcum <marcum@acpub.duke.edu>
Date: Wed, 7 Aug 1996 13:13:01 -0400 (EDT) Bring three kinds of beans to a boil in a large amount of water and boil for about five minutes, then turn off heat and let sit for an hour. Rinse and retun to medium-low heat with enough stock to cover, plus about an inch. Add remainder of ingredients except salt, and simmer until red beans are soft, about 90 minutes. Salt to taste. The split peas and barley will get mushy and make the soup thick.
